Of course, you can also meet us in person at one of our events on campus or in a city near you . We're happy to help.                   NYU Admissions staff welcome your questions. Before reaching out to us directly, we encourage you to do as much website research as possible.     For questions about the admissions process, please email admissions@nyu.edu .   Please include your full name, the school or institution you currently attend, and your city in e-mail correspondence.     During busy periods, it may take some time for us to respond to your inquiry.
